item.title: Living in a land down dunder
item.description:
Description

This talk will cover some common uses of dunder methods and some not so common. It will also lightly cover the process of editing the C Python source in order to add your own operator/dunder method combo to the C Python interpreter.

Paul Logston Bio

Paul Logston is a New York City based developer. He helps organize and run the NYC Python, Learn Python NYC, and PyGotham events that take place in NYC. He works at 15Five and teaches at Columbia.
item.dc:creator: Paul Logston

item.title: State of the PyVideo
item.description:
Description

PyVideo.org has undergone significant changes over the past year. It's changed teams, infrastructure, and looks. Come hear about the progress the PyVideo team is making and the direction in which PyVideo is headed.

Paul Logston Bio

Paul Logston is a New York City based developer. He helps organize and run the NYC Python, Learn Python NYC, and PyGotham events that take place in NYC. He works at 15Five and teaches at Columbia.
item.dc:creator: Paul Logston
